text:
University of Kentucky
LEXINGTON
College of Adult and Extension Education
March 9, 1956
Assn, for Education By Radio-Television
228 No. LaSalle Street
Chicago 1, Illinois
Gentlemen:
Our Package Library Service is interested in acquiring free
materials on educational television and radio for use in filling
requests from schools and women's groups. Mr. L. V. Hollweck of
the RCA Victor Educational Division gave me your address as a
possible source of such material. Could you supply us with
several copies of each available item on this subject? We will
appreciate it very much.
Very truly yours,
